EmailTemplate.name: pop-up Enabling For My Portfolio1
EmailTemplate.subject: Solution For Problems of My Portfolio
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Account.Name},
Trust you are doing well.
The site www.ffreedom.in allow you to get logged in to Ffreedom customer portal. Once you login to your account and when you click 'My Portfolio' tab you can face some problems related to browser, such as it doesn't allow pop-ups. To get resolved from such kind of problems, please fing attachments.
Thank You, Ffreedom Team.
